about_the_game: This DLC will added new feature called "Bond Level". That show the bond between Guardian Spirit and main character. A nudity scene will be unlocked when Guardian Spirit reach certain bond level.

content_descriptors.notes:
Each Guardian Spirit in the game have a parameter called "Bond Level", when you reach certain level, you can access her nudity scene.
All character is over 18 year old.

detailed_description: This DLC will added new feature called "Bond Level". That show the bond between Guardian Spirit and main character. A nudity scene will be unlocked when Guardian Spirit reach certain bond level.
name: Guardians of the Ashes - The Lost Memories (R18)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Dual or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or AMD Equivalent
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or AMD Equivalent
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
